title: Android-Based Microlearning Courses for Strengthening Construction Workforce Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Construction site practical experience and fundamental materials management knowledge
context.additional_context: UDL (Universal Design for Learning) application process supporting adult learners' self-directed learning in smartphone-based limited tech environments

learning_goals: Analyze construction material properties and present at least three field-applicable selection criteria
Simulate material installation processes according to standard procedures and diagnose error cases
Submit weekly project deliverables using microlearning modules to demonstrate practical problem-solving skills

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
